thread.title: Ann Arbor will be a test city for Verizon 5G
thread.title_full: Ann Arbor will be a test city for Verizon 5G

author: freep.com
title: Ann Arbor will be a test city for Verizon 5G
text:
MORE Ann Arbor has been selected as one of 11 markets where Verizon will test its new 5G network, the company announced Wednesday.
Verizon will begin offering the 5G service to select pilot customers during the first half of 2017.
Read more:
The why's and what's of 5G
The wireless wars came back
Verizon shaves $350 million from Yahoo price
Other test cities include, Atlanta, Bernardsville, N.J., Brockton, Mass., Dallas, Denver, Houston, Miami, Sacramento, Seattle and Washington, D.C.
"The 5G systems we are deploying will soon provide wireless broadband service to homes, enabling customers to experience cost-competitive, gigabit speeds that were previously only deliverable via fiber," said Woojune Kim, Vice President, Next Generation Business Team, Samsung Electronics.
